    Created by Hacknocraft LLC on 2016-12-08.

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        rx.Observable<User> getUser(java.lang.String userId)
        Retrieves a non-cached User from the AppFriends system based on user id

        Subject to rate limiting from AppFriends servers
        Parameters:
        userId -
        Returns:
        an Observable with the retrieved User

      • updateUserName

        rx.Completable updateUserName(java.lang.String userName)
        Modify user name of current user.
        Parameters:
        userName - user name
        Returns:
        A Completable that completes when the user name has been successfully updated

      • updateUserAvatar

        rx.Completable updateUserAvatar(java.lang.String avatarUrl)
        Modify user name of current user.
        Parameters:
        avatarUrl - user avatar
        Returns:
        A Completable that completes when the avatar has been successfully updated

      • blockUser

        rx.Completable blockUser(java.lang.String userId)
        Block another user.

        If user A blocks user B, B will no longer be able to send any private message to A.
        Parameters:
        userId - user id of the blocked user
        Returns:
        A Completable that completes when the user has been successfully blocked.

      • unblockUser

        rx.Completable unblockUser(java.lang.String userId)
        Unblock another user.
        Parameters:
        userId -
        Returns:
        A Completable that completes when the user has been successfully unblocked.

      • followUser

        rx.Completable followUser(java.lang.String userId)
        Follow another user.

        Parameters:
        userId - user id of the followed user
        Returns:
        A Completable that completes when the user has been successfully followed.

      • unfollowUser

        rx.Completable unfollowUser(java.lang.String userId)
        Unfollow another user.

        Parameters:
        userId - user id of the unfollowed user
        Returns:
        A Completable that completes when the user has been successfully unfollowed.

      • getFollowers

        rx.Observable<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getFollowers()
        Get followers of the current user.

        Returns:
        An Observable of a list of user ids that are followers of the current user.

      • getFollowing

        rx.Observable<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getFollowing()
        Get following of the current user.

        Returns:
        An Observable of a list of user ids that the current user follows.

      • getFriends

        rx.Observable<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getFriends()
        Get friends of the current user.

        Returns:
        An Observable of a list of user ids that are friends with the current user.

      • searchUsers

        rx.Observable<SearchUserResult> searchUsers(java.lang.String keyword,
                                            int page)
        Search users.
        Parameters:
        keyword - Must match the full name of users.
        page - The page number is start from 1.
        Returns:
        An of searching result.
